name: myfitnesspal_scrape_exercise
description: Search and scrape exercise data on MyFitnessPal. Returns exercise name and calories burned per duration.

steps.code: const results = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.exercise-item, [class*="Exercise"], li')).slice(0,10).map(el => { const name = el.querySelector('a, [class*="name"]')?.textContent?.trim()||el.textContent.trim(); const cal = el.querySelector('[class*="calories"], .calories-burned')?.textContent?.trim()||''; return { name: name.substring(0,100), calories_burned: cal }; }).filter(r=>r.name); return { search: '{{exercise_name}}', results }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
